scripts.say: Ah, you're back, Hipper. Did you manage to "single-handedly take down the Royal Navy twerps without breaking a sweat," like you said you would?
Shut up! Like anyone was expecting her to run away with her tail between her legs! ... Yeah, I know, I shouldn't have broken formation... Go ahead! Call me an idiot, punish me, I don't care!
Short temper, as always... Next time, I recommend asking us for assistance first.
Huh?! Why would I need YOUR help?
*Sigh*... In any event, it's not too late to catch up to Glorious. As your solo mission failed, we will come with you this time. Scharnhorst, let's get going.
Believe me, I'm raring to go. I'll head wherever there's a fight to be had. C'mon, let's avenge Hipper!
"Avenge"? I'm not pushing up daisies over here, you know! Hey! Wait for me!
